TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PostBackTriggerControlIDConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

summary.span: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.

span.span: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并提供以在设计时环境中的属性网格控件中显示的控件 Id 的列表。The class derives from the class and provides a list of control IDs for display in a property grid control in design-time environments. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)和[通用类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)。For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) and [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器对象。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object.

summary.span: Returns a collection of control IDs from the container in the object when provided with a format context.

returns.span: A collection of strings that represent the control IDs of the controls in the current container.

returns.span: If no controls are currently contained, the method returns an empty collection.
